result.eng: Your father will be in good health again before long.
result.ga: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.orig: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.html: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfadYour father will be in good health again before long.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ d'aṫair ina ẛláinte arís sul i ḃfadYour father will be in good health again before long.

result.eng: It will be over before long.
result.ga: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfad
result.orig: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfad
result.html: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfadIt will be over before long.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ deireaḋ leis sul i ḃfadIt will be over before long.

result.eng: The boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.
result.ga: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arís
result.orig: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arís
result.html: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arísThe boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an bád ag druidim isteaċ sa ċé agus sul i ḃfad ḃí siad ar ṫalaṁ tirim arísThe boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.

result.eng: If it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ga: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.orig: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.html: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ponchtml: Más aṁlaiḋ go ḃfuil na páirtiṫe sásta cuṁaċt a roinnt beiḋ coṁrialtas ann sul i ḃfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.

result.eng: The question is much clearer now.
result.ga: Tá an cheist i bhfad níos soiléire anois
result.orig: Tá an cheist i bhfad níos soiléire anois
result.html: Tá an cheist i bhfad níos soiléire anoisThe question is much clearer now.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċeist i ḃfad níos soiléire anoisThe question is much clearer now.

result.ga: Tá sé i bhfad níos soiléire anois
result.orig: Tá sé i bhfad níos soiléire anois
result.html: Tá sé i bhfad níos soiléire anoisIt is much clearer now.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé i ḃfad níos soiléire anoisIt is much clearer now.

result.eng: This is way bigger than I thought.
result.ga: Tá sé seo i bhfad Éireann níos mó ná mar a cheap mé
result.orig: Tá sé seo i bhfad Éireann níos mó ná mar a cheap mé
result.html: Tá sé seo i bhfad Éireann níos mó ná mar a cheap méThis is way bigger than I thought.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé seo i ḃfad Éireann níos mó ná mar a ċeap méThis is way bigger than I thought.

result.ga: Tá mé i bhfad níos fearr
result.orig: Tá mé i bhfad níos fearr
result.html: Tá mé i bhfad níos fearrI am much better.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i ḃfad níos fearrI am much better.

result.eng: Will we have to put up with this whimpering for long?
result.ga: An mbeidh orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feadh i bhfad
result.orig: An mbeidh orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feadh i bhfad
result.html: An mbeidh orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feadh i bhfadWill we have to put up with this whimpering for long?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feaḋ i ḃfadWill we have to put up with this whimpering for long?

result.eng: Don't be out for too long.
result.html: Ná bí i bhfad amuighDon't be out for too long.
result.ponchtml: Ná bí i ḃfad amuiġDon't be out for too long.
